reviews.review_msg: What a wonderful teacher! She gives out her criteria and the due dates at the very start of the semester and everything is detailed! She is super sweet and amazing, and open minded. She loves to hear what you have to say and encourages anyone to speak up so don't be afraid!

Jillian was amazing!!! She has no PowerPoints so its so much easier to take notes from just what she talked about. She always wrote the important stuff on the board as well. There werent any tests and the projects were easy. Shes so friendly and nice!!! You dont really need the text since theres no exam. Just make sure to watch the films etc!!!
